description: ff. 177. 205 x 145; 150 x 95 mm. 17 lin. Jumādá II, 1054, ʻAbd al-Bāqī ibn Jumʻah ibn Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-ʻUdhrī al-Ḥanafī al-Shaʻrānī. This title (fol. 1a of the present ms.) is mentioned by Ibn al-ʻArabī in his ijāzah for al-Malik al-Muẓaffar (ed. Badawī, Andalus v. 20, 1955, p. 107 sqq.) as no. 192; see also Yaḥyá, Histoire, no. 673. The book is divided into unnumbered sections, the first three of them beginning as follows: (2a) حضرة الامان المومن (3b) حضرة المهىمنىة والمهىمن (5b) حضرة العزة والعزىز Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى علّم آدم الاسماء واختار محمدا للمرتبة العلىة ... وبعد فان للاسما الالهىة حضرات علىة
author: Ibn al-ʻArabī, 1165-1240
title: Sharḥ al-asmāʼ.
creator: Ibn al-ʻArabī, 1165-1240
subject: Islam—Doctrines—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
